# NSSpellChecker.CorrectionIndicatorType.reversion

**Case**

Provides the option to revert to the original form after a correction has been made.

## Declaration

```swift
case reversion
```

## Constants

- **NSSpellChecker.CorrectionIndicatorType.default**: The default indicator that shows a proposed correction.
- **NSSpellChecker.CorrectionIndicatorType.guesses**: Shows multiple alternatives from which the user may choose the appropriate spelling.
